verses.verse: וַיַּקְהֵ֣ל <WH6950> vai-yak-Hel assembled דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> da-Vid And David אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> sa-Rei all the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> sa-Rei the princes הַשְּׁבָטִ֣ים <WH7626> hash-she-va-Tim of the tribes וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> ve-sa-Rei and the captains הַמַּחְלְק֣וֹת <WH4256> ham-mach-le-Kot of the companies הַמְשָׁרְתִ֪ים <WH8334> ham-sha-re-Tim that ministered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמֶּ֟לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech to the king וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> ve-sa-Rei and the captains הָאֲלָפִ֣ים <WH505> ha-'a-la-Fim over the thousands וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> ve-sa-Rei and captains הַמֵּא֡וֹת <WH3967> ham-me-'ot over the hundreds וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> ve-sa-Rei and the stewards כָל־ <WH3605> chol of all רְכוּשׁ־ <WH7399> re-chush- over all the substance וּמִקְנֶה֩׀ <WH4735> u-mik-Neh and possession לַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> lam-Me-lech of the king וּלְבָנָ֜יו <WH1121> u-le-va-Nav and of his sons עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with הַסָּרִיסִ֧ים <WH5631> has-sa-ri-Sim with the officers וְהַגִּבּוֹרִ֛ים <WH1368> ve-hag-gib-bo-Rim and with the mighty men וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> u-le-chol- all גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> gib-Bor men חָ֖יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil and with all the valiant men אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- at יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. unto Jerusalem

וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom stood up דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> da-Vid Then David הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech the king עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto רַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> rag-Lav, upon his feet וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said שְׁמָע֖וּנִי <WH8085> she-ma-'U-ni Hear אַחַ֣י <WH251> 'a-Chai me my brethren וְעַמִּ֑י <WH5971> ve-'am-Mi; and my people אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with לְבָבִ֡י <WH3824> le-va-Vi [As for me] I [had] in mine heart לִבְנוֹת֩ <WH1129> liv-nOt to build בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> beit an house מְנוּחָ֜ה <WH4496> me-nu-Chah of rest לַאֲר֣וֹן <WH727> la-'a-Ron for the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> be-rit- of the covenant יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וְלַהֲדֹם֙ <WH1916> ve-la-ha-Dom stool רַגְלֵ֣י <WH7272> rag-Lei to his feet אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, of our God וַהֲכִינ֖וֹתִי <WH3559> va-ha-chi-No-ti and had made ready לִבְנֽוֹת׃ <WH1129> liv-Not. for the building

וְהָאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> ve-ha-'E-lo-Him But God אָ֣מַר <WH559> 'A-mar said לִ֔י Li, לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תִבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> tiv-Neh unto me Thou shalt not build בַ֖יִת <WH1004> Va-yit an house לִשְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> lish-Mi; for my name כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki because אִ֧ישׁ <WH376> 'ish because thou [hast been] a man מִלְחָמ֛וֹת <WH4421> mil-cha-Mot of war אַ֖תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah you וְדָמִ֥ים <WH1818> ve-da-Mim blood שָׁפָֽכְתָּ׃ <WH8210> sha-Fa-che-ta. and hast shed

וַיִּבְחַ֡ר <WH977> vai-yiv-Char chose יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֵי֩ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בִּ֜י bi מִכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> mik-Kol all בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- me before all the house אָבִ֗י <WH1> 'a-Vi, of my father לִהְי֨וֹת <WH1961> lih-Yot become לְמֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> le-Me-lech to be king עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El over Israel לְעוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam, for ever כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for בִֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> vi-hu-Dah Judah בָּחַ֣ר <WH977> ba-Char for he hath chosen לְנָגִ֔יד <WH5057> le-na-Gid, [to be] the ruler וּבְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> u-ve-Veit and of the house יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit the house אָבִ֑י <WH1> 'a-Vi; of my father וּבִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-viv-Nei and among the sons אָבִ֔י <WH1> 'a-Vi, of my father בִּ֣י bi רָצָ֔ה <WH7521> ra-Tzah, he liked לְהַמְלִ֖יךְ <WH4427> le-ham-Lich me to make [me] king עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. over all Israel

וּמִכָּ֨ל־ <WH3605> u-mik-Kal- of all בָּנַ֔י <WH1121> ba-Nai, And of all my sons כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for רַבִּ֣ים <WH7227> rab-Bim me many בָּנִ֔ים <WH1121> ba-Nim, my son נָ֥תַן <WH5414> Na-tan hath given לִ֖י li יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; (for the LORD וַיִּבְחַר֙ <WH977> vai-yiv-Char acceptable בִּשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> bish-lo-Moh Solomon בְנִ֔י <WH1121> ve-Ni, my sons לָשֶׁ֗בֶת <WH3427> la-She-vet, to sit עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over כִּסֵּ֛א <WH3678> kis-Se upon the throne מַלְכ֥וּת <WH4438> mal-Chut of the kingdom יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. over Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said לִ֔י Li, שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh unto me Solomon בִנְךָ֔ <WH1121> vin-Cha, thy son הֽוּא־ <WH1931> hu- who יִבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> yiv-Neh he shall build בֵיתִ֖י <WH1004> vei-Ti my house וַחֲצֵרוֹתָ֑י <WH2691> va-cha-tze-ro-Tai; and my courts כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for בָחַ֨רְתִּי <WH977> va-Char-ti for I have chosen ב֥וֹ vo לִי֙ li לְבֵ֔ן <WH1121> le-Ven, him [to be] my son וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I אֶֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> 'eh-yeh- become לּ֥וֹ lo לְאָֽב׃ <WH1> le-'Av. and I will be his father

וַהֲכִינוֹתִ֥י <WH3559> va-ha-chi-no-Ti Moreover I will establish אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַלְכוּת֖וֹ <WH4438> mal-chu-To his kingdom עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- for לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam; for ever אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if יֶחֱזַ֗ק <WH2388> ye-che-Zak, if he be constant לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot to do מִצְוֹתַ֥י <WH4687> mitz-vo-Tai my commandments וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> u-mish-pa-Tai and my judgments כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> kai-Yom as at this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. he

וְ֠עַתָּה <WH6258> Ve-'at-tah now לְעֵינֵ֨י <WH5869> le-'ei-Nei Now therefore in the sight כָל־ <WH3605> chol of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of all Israel קְהַל־ <WH6951> ke-hal- the congregation יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וּבְאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> u-ve-'a-ze-Nei and in the audience אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, of our God שִׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> shim-Ru keep וְדִרְשׁ֔וּ <WH1875> ve-dir-Shu, and seek כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מִצְוֹ֖ת <WH4687> mitz-Vot for all the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an so תִּֽירְשׁוּ֙ <WH3423> ti-re-Shu that ye may possess אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz land הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> hat-to-Vah, this good וְהִנְחַלְתֶּ֛ם <WH5157> ve-hin-chal-Tem and leave [it] for an inheritance לִבְנֵיכֶ֥ם <WH1121> liv-nei-Chem for your children אַחֲרֵיכֶ֖ם <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Chem after עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- you for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. ever פ Peh

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you שְׁלֹמֹֽה־ <WH8010> she-lo-moh- And thou Solomon בְנִ֡י <WH1121> ve-Ni my son דַּע֩ <WH3045> da' know אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei thou the God אָבִ֜יךָ <WH1> 'a-Vi-cha of thy father וְעָבְדֵ֗הוּ <WH5647> ve-'a-ve-De-hu, and serve בְּלֵ֤ב <WH3820> be-Lev heart שָׁלֵם֙ <WH8003> sha-Lem him with a perfect וּבְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> u-ve-Ne-fesh mind חֲפֵצָ֔ה <WH2655> cha-fe-Tzah, and with a willing כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for כָל־ <WH3605> chol all לְבָבוֹת֙ <WH3824> le-va-Vot all hearts דּוֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH1875> do-Resh searcheth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, for the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol every יֵ֥צֶר <WH3336> Ye-tzer all the imaginations מַחֲשָׁב֖וֹת <WH4284> ma-cha-sha-Vot of the thoughts מֵבִ֑ין <WH995> me-Vin; and understandeth אִֽם־ <WH518> 'im- If תִּדְרְשֶׁ֙נּוּ֙ <WH1875> tid-re-Shen-nu if thou seek יִמָּ֣צֵא <WH4672> yim-Ma-tze him he will be found לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if תַּֽעַזְבֶ֖נּוּ <WH5800> ta-'az-Ven-nu of thee but if thou forsake יַזְנִיחֲךָ֥ <WH2186> yaz-ni-cha-Cha him he will cast thee off לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> la-'Ad. for ever

רְאֵ֣ה׀ <WH7200> re-'Eh Take heed עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah, now כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh now for the LORD בָּ֧חַר <WH977> Ba-char hath chosen בְּךָ֛ be-Cha לִבְנֽוֹת־ <WH1129> Liv-not- thee to build בַּ֥יִת <WH1004> Ba-yit an house לַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <WH4720> lam-mik-Dash for the sanctuary חֲזַ֥ק <WH2388> cha-Zak be strong וַעֲשֵֽׂה׃ <WH6213> va-'a-Seh. and do פ Peh

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten gave דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> da-Vid Then David לִשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> lish-lo-Moh to Solomon בְנ֡וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- תַּבְנִ֣ית <WH8403> tav-Nit the pattern הָאוּלָם֩ <WH197> ha-'u-Lam of the porch וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּ֨תָּ֜יו <WH1004> bat-Tav and of the houses וְגַנְזַכָּ֧יו <WH1597> ve-gan-zak-Kav thereof and of the treasuries וַעֲלִיֹּתָ֛יו <WH5944> va-'a-li-yo-Tav thereof and of the upper chambers וַחֲדָרָ֥יו <WH2315> va-cha-da-Rav parlours הַפְּנִימִ֖ים <WH6442> hap-pe-ni-Mim thereof and of the inner וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> u-Veit thereof and of the place הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret. of the mercy seat

וְתַבְנִ֗ית <WH8403> ve-tav-Nit, And the pattern כֹּל֩ <WH3605> kol of all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher he הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> ha-Yah had בָר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> va-Ru-ach of all that he had by the spirit עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo, for לְחַצְר֧וֹת <WH2691> le-chatz-Rot of the courts בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> u-le-chol- and for all הַלְּשָׁכ֖וֹת <WH3957> hal-le-sha-Chot and of all the chambers סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> sa-Viv; round about לְאֹֽצְרוֹת֙ <WH214> le-'o-tze-rOt of the treasuries בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וּלְאֹצְר֖וֹת <WH214> u-le-'o-tze-Rot and of the treasuries הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> hak-ko-da-Shim. of the dedicated things

וּֽלְמַחְלְקוֹת֙ <WH4256> u-le-mach-le-kOt Also for the courses הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim, and the Levites וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> u-le-chol- and for all מְלֶ֖אכֶת <WH4399> me-Le-chet and for all the work עֲבוֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> a-vo-Dat of the service בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> u-le-chol- and for all כְּלֵ֖י <WH3627> ke-Lei and for all the vessels עֲבוֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> a-vo-Dat of service בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

לַזָּהָ֤ב <WH2091> laz-za-Hav [He gave] of gold בַּמִּשְׁקָל֙ <WH4948> bam-mish-Kal by weight לַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> laz-za-Hav, for [things] of gold לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol for all כְּלֵ֖י <WH3627> ke-Lei for all instruments עֲבוֹדָ֣ה <WH5656> a-vo-Dah of all manner of service וַעֲבוֹדָ֑ה <WH5656> va-'a-vo-Dah; of every kind of service לְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> le-Chol every כְּלֵ֤י <WH3627> ke-Lei [silver also] for all instruments הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> hak-Ke-sef of silver בְּמִשְׁקָ֔ל <WH4948> be-mish-Kal, by weight לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol for all כְּלֵ֖י <WH3627> ke-Lei for all instruments עֲבוֹדָ֥ה <WH5656> a-vo-Dah kind וַעֲבוֹדָֽה׃ <WH5656> va-'a-vo-Dah. of service
